text: Stefanos Tsitsipas was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Lorenzo Sonego won the title after defeating Dustin Brown 6–2, 6–1 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw AON Open Challenger - Singles 2018 Singles
title: 2018 AON Open Challenger – Singles
